segments.text: The overflowing sink is disgusting, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is ignoring the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids sneaking cookies make me sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, about to crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, expecting handouts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing is so irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the floor and doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine, mocking the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is no one turning off the water?
segments.speaker: PAR
